author: devjiwonchoi
message: fix: eslint-config-next types was exporting to dist/src (#85768) `eslint-config-next` types were being emitted to `dist/src` instead of `dist/` during build. | Before | After | |--------|--------| | | | Fixes https://github.com/vercel/next.js/issues/85379 Closes: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/84929 Closes: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/85653
